title: Classic Watch Face - Moto 360

descriptionHTML:
Model Number: FR-A02

Have a look at the first edition of FR-A02 Classic Watchface.

This Classic and Minimal Watchface is advanced technology inspired by the elegant design of analogue watches. This watch face is designed keeping in mind the classic look for your smart watch. Excellence achieved in the new elegant designed loaded with a variety of features that ease you from hassle of keeping your cell phone in your hand.

• Analogue view of time and Date
• Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge

This simple white Watchface is designed for all round and square display watches so you can use it with Moto 360, Smart watch 3, Samsung Gear and all other.

Fully compatible with your LG G Watch, LG G Watch R or Samsung Gear LIVE.

How it works?
It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen.
comments: Great looking watch face Looks preety nice.. But how do I remove the battery indicator from the middle? I dont see it in the pics in the playstore.
It doesn't work on my moto360. The watch face is all messed up
Messed up on 360 The preview looks nice but in reality it's all out of alignment
